009package imagingbook.sampleimages;
010
011import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
012
013
014public enum SiftTestImage implements ImageResource {
015        box00("box00.png"),
016        box15("box15.png"),
017        box30("box30.png"),
018        box45("box45.png"),
019        box60("box60.png"),
020        box75("box75.png"),
021        box90("box90.png"),
022        halfdiskH("halfdiskH.png"),
023        halfdiskV("halfdiskV.png"),
024        ireland02tiny("ireland02tiny.png"),
025        rectangleH("rectangleH.png"),
026        rectangleV("rectangleV.png"),
027        stars("stars.png"),
028        starsH("starsH.png"),
029        starsV("starsV.png"),
030        ;
031        
032        private static final String BASEDIR = "sift/";
033        
034        private final String relPath;
035        
036        @Override
037        public String getRelativePath() {
038                return relPath;
039        }
040        
041        SiftTestImage(String filename) {
042                this.relPath = BASEDIR + filename;
043        }
044}
